remarks: Law of excluded middle for orthoposets.  ( ~ chjo analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2011.)
statement:
opexmid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
opexmid.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
opexmid.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
opexmid.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
opexmid $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .\/ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = .1. ) $.
